meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a group of fungi known as Phycomycetes.
meanings.sent1: The phycomycetous fungi prefer damp environments for growth.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the phycomycetous characteristics of the fungi under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The phycomycetous mushrooms threw a party in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a phycomycetous wonderland, with fungi sprouting everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The phycomycetous nature of the fungi made them easily identifiable to the researchers.

meanings.definition: A member of the Phycomycetes group of fungi.
meanings.sent1: The phycomycetous was carefully examined by the mycologist.
meanings.sent2: Many phycomycetous can be found in the forest during the rainy season.
meanings.sent3: The phycomycetous decided to start a band with other fungi.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fungi, the phycomycetous stood out like a star in the sky.
meanings.sent5: Children in the biology class were fascinated by the phycomycetous fungi on the slide.
